text: Hello!
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
Good morning, what's on the menu for breakfast?
I'm looking for a place to have lunch. What do you recommend?
I want to try something new. What's your chef's special?
I'm interested in your vegan options. Can you tell me more?
Do you have gluten-free alternatives?
I'd like to order a large pepperoni pizza for delivery.
What's your most popular dish?
I'm hosting a party. Do you offer catering services?
What are your operating hours on weekends?
Are you open on public holidays?
I'm planning a romantic dinner. Can I make a reservation for two?
Do you have outdoor seating available?
How do I get to your restaurant from downtown?
I'm lost. Can you guide me to your location?
What's the quickest way to reach you from the airport?
I had a great experience last time I visited. Just wanted to share!
I'd like to provide some feedback on my recent dining experience.
Your restaurant was recommended to me by a friend. Looking forward to trying it!
I'm allergic to nuts. Do you have dishes that are nut-free?
What's the price range for your main courses?
I'd like to make a reservation for a party of six on Friday evening.
Do you offer gift vouchers or gift cards?
I'm a vegetarian. Can you recommend some options for me?
I'm planning a surprise birthday dinner. Can you help me arrange something special?
What's the ambiance like at your restaurant?
I'm in the mood for seafood. What do you have available?
Can I see your wine list?
What's your corkage fee if I bring my own wine?
I'm visiting from out of town. Is there anything unique on your menu that I should try?
I'm looking for a family-friendly restaurant. Do you have a kids' menu?
